name: Plastic Rounds
description:
Plastic Rounds is a four player local twin stick competitive shoot-em-up multiplayer game that heavily emphasizes our core game mechanic of a two-stage shooting method.

This was our graduating project at Sheridan College and it has been showcased at the EGLX and the LevelUp Showcase in Toronto Canada.

Infamous Empty plans to continue working on this project in the future but will be on hold for the time being.

NOTE: This game is competitive local-multiplayer and does require controllers to play.
